org.ow2.bonita.facade.internal
Interface RemoteQueryDefinitionAPI

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Subinterfaces:
EJB2QueryDefinitionAPI
public interface RemoteQueryDefinitionAPI
extends Remote

For internal use only.

                             String processVersion,
                             Map<String,String> options)
                             throws ProcessNotFoundException,
                                    RemoteException
Returns the process definition for the specified process name and process version.

Parameters:
processId - the process name.
processVersion - the process version.
options - the options map (domain, queyList, user)
Returns:
the process definition for the specified process name and process version.

getLightProcesses

Set<LightProcessDefinition> getLightProcesses(Map<String,String> options)
                                              throws RemoteException
Returns the set of definition information of all deployed processes. A lightProcessDefinition is a ProcessDefinition containing only required information.

Parameters:
options - the options map (domain, queyList, user)
Returns:
the set of LightProcessDefinition of all deployed processes.
Throws:
RemoteException

Returns:

Throws:
RemoteException

getProcesses

Set<ProcessDefinition> getProcesses(String processId,
                                    Map<String,String> options)
                                    throws RemoteException
Returns the set of definition informations for the process with the specified process name. These process information are searched into the current recorded information and into the archived informations. A process with the given process name could have been deployed, enabled and disabled several times.

Parameters:
processId - the process name
options - the options map (domain, queyList, user)
Returns:
set of ProcessDefinition of the specified process name.
Throws:
RemoteException

getLightProcesses

List<LightProcessDefinition> getLightProcesses(int fromIndex,
                                               int pageSize,
                                               Map<String,String> options)
                                               throws RemoteException
Returns a "page" (i.e. a set) of processes ordered by label.

Parameters:
fromIndex - from which index the page is built
pageSize - the number of page elements
options - the options map (domain, queyList, user)
Returns:
an ordered list of LightProcessDefinition
Throws:
RemoteException

getLightProcesses

List<LightProcessDefinition> getLightProcesses(int fromIndex,
                                               int pageSize,
                                               ProcessDefinitionCriterion pagingCriterion,
                                               Map<String,String> options)
                                               throws RemoteException
Returns a "page" (i.e. a set) of processes ordered by the given criterion.

Parameters:
fromIndex - from which index the page is built
pageSize - the number of page elements
pagingCriterion - the criterion used to sort the retrieved process
options - the options map (domain, queyList, user)

an ordered list of LightProcessDefinition

getLightProcesses

List<LightProcessDefinition> getLightProcesses(Set<ProcessDefinitionUUID> processUUIDs,
                                               int fromIndex,
                                               int pageSize,
                                               ProcessDefinitionCriterion pagingCriterion,
                                               Map<String,String> options)
                                               throws ProcessNotFoundException,
                                                      RemoteException
Returns a "page" (i.e. a set) of processes ordered by the given criterion.
Only the process from the given ProcessDefinitionUUIDs will be considered.

Parameters:
fromIndex - from which index the page is built
pageSize - the number of page elements
pagingCriterion - the criterion used to sort the retrieved process
Returns:
an ordered list of LightProcessDefinition
Throws:
ProcessNotFoundException
RemoteException
